title: Some ideas to change face shape
body:
Hello guys, I've tried a simple way to change face shape in unity engine.
I'm not good at python, so I post details here.
There is how I did it.
Basicaly it made by 3 layers.
![layers](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44298872/94986601-a0702400-0592-11eb-893c-a94bc7acfbe6.jpg)
At first, I made a mesh include 68 landmark points and 7 forehead points.
![face_mesh_1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44298872/94986567-77e82a00-0592-11eb-90e9-22792df560db.jpg)
The red points are calculate by landmark points.
Then set the croped dst image to this mesh as a texture.
Ant then set the landmark points coordinate to the mesh vertices and uv vertces.
To morph face shape,it need set the src image's landmark points coordinate to this mesh again.
To merge smoothly, I add a mask for the mesh.
![mask](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44298872/94986832-88999f80-0594-11eb-8659-cc228cbb6a06.jpg)
For DeepFaceLab, it sould include Xseg mask,too.
After these steps done, cover the mesh on top just like the first imsge I've posted.
That's all.
Maybe it's not the best solution, it's still worked fine.
Hope someday can see this function in DeepFaceLab.  :)
